message.content: {"id": "123523", "title": "Bug 123523: Previewing a scripted data set mapped to a java event handler throws NullPointerException", "description": "When previewing a scripted data set that is mapped to a java event handler, a NullPointerException is thrown at the method ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath. This is because the context is null in this case. The reason for using the context is to utilize cached class loaders whenever possible. To address this issue, we can either provide an external map to use as a cache or find an alternative mechanism to obtain the class loader if the context is null.", "OB": "Currently, when previewing a scripted data set, if the context is null, a NullPointerException is thrown at the method ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath.", "EB": "To address this issue, we need to implement an alternative mechanism to get the class loader if the context is null.", "SR": "When previewing a scripted data set, we should try to obtain a class loader from the ExecutionContext to avoid a NullPointerException."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '123523', 'title': 'Bug 123523Previewing a scripted data set mapped to a java event handler throws NPE', 'description': '(See ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath). The context will be null in this case. The reason for using the context is to use cached class loaders when possible. We can either provide an external map to use as cache, or not bother with caching at all. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Need to use some other mechanism to get the class loader if the context is null. ', 'SR': 'When previewing a scripted data set we try to get a class loader from the ExecutionContext. '}
